arts.ttl: AC Milan ready to welcome Cremonese
arts.sum: The Rossoneri return to league action following an eighth-place finish last season, which, for the first time in a decade, meant starting their Coppa Italia Frecciarossa campaign from the first round (a 2-0 victory over Bari). San Siro is set to stage AC Milan v Cremonese on the opening matchday of the Serie A Enilive season.

arts.ttl: AC Milan vs Cremonese – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AC Milan kick off their Serie A campaign against newly-promoted Cremonese on Saturday at San Siro. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to the season, with Milan looking to bounce back from last season’s disappointing eighth-place finish under new coach Massimiliano Allegri.
